title: 107_hr4208
content: Red Lake Band of Chippewa Indians of Minnesota Use or Distribution of Indian Judgment Funds Plan Approval Act - Approves the Use or Distribution Plan for specified escrowed funds, investment income, and funds secured to the Red Lake Band from the order and judgment entered in its favor on January 16, 2001. Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Office of Trust Funds Management, to immediately disburse the funds as specified, including amounts for: (1) a permanent trust fund, (2) litigation-related expenses incurred for Docket 189-C claims, (3) land restoration project expenses and fees, and (4) per capita disbursement to Red Lake Band members.
